name: Panoramic Panic
description:
Panoramic Panic! It's a game from a game jam I did in late 2018. I specifically did the art and sound for the game. Please enjoy!

Enter a number 1 through 13 then press Enter to go to that stage!

Click on the screen and drag it around to move the ball!

If Windows gives you a warning, just expand the details and press Run Anyways
